song_lyrics: Sadguru sāchā re, sevo shuddh bhāvshu re,
Jethī ṭaḷe mannā vividh vīkār re;
Jen sange vādhe re, Prabhu sange prītḍī re,
Ṭaḷī jāy jāt varṇa ahamkār re... sadguru 1
Vartmān pānch re, paḷāve dradh karī re,
Evā gurudev re, Govind sam jāṇīe re,
Jene sange pāmīe bhavjaḷ pār re... sadguru 2
Guru vinā gnān re, na pāme manmukhī re,
Kahe chhe em mahāmuni Veda Purāṇ re;
Evu te vichārī re, sadguru sevjo re,
Jethī Hari pāmīe pragaṭ pramāṇ re... sadguru 3
Gurujīnā vachan re, vichārī ur dhārjo re,
Ṭāḷo tame moh mamtā abhimān re;
Muktānand kahe chhe re, evī rīte vartatā re,
Tene ur vās kare Bhagwān re... sadguru 4
title: Sadguru sāchā re sevo shuddh bhāvshu re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-610: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
